sources.title: 4K RESTORATIONüçïRiders of Death Valley (1941) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Dick Foran, Leo Carrillo, Buck Jones, Lon Chaney
Directed by:  Ford Beebe & Ray Taylor

In this star-packed serial, our able heroes escape various perils devised by the evil Wolfe Reade and his pack of outlaws, who wish to lay claim to a fabled lost mine.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
1:03       CHAPTER 1:  Death Marks the Trail
20:57     CHAPTER 2:  The Menacing Herd
39:53     CHAPTER 3:  The Plunge of Peril
59:11     CHAPTER 4:  Flaming Fury
1:17:45  CHAPTER 5:  The Avalanche of Doom
1:37:06  CHAPTER 6:  Blood and Gold
1:57:11  CHAPTER 7:  Death Rides the Storm
2:15:29  CHAPTER 8:  Descending Doom
2:34:49  CHAPTER 9:  Death Holds the Reins
2:54:19  CHAPTER 10:  Devouring Flames
3:12:00  CHAPTER 11:  The Fatal Blast
3:30:34  CHAPTER 12:  Thundering Doom
3:48:06  CHAPTER 13:  Bridge of Disaster
4:05:48  CHAPTER 14:  A Fight to the Death
4:26:52  CHAPTER 15:  The Harvest of Hate
4:45:56  Please Subscribe!
